name: Immortal Rose
description:
✦--------------------------------------------------------------------------✦

Immortal Rose

Following closely to the end of the Grand War, a young woman named Raven is tasked with exploring the world and her city of Sylar.  Along the way she fights enemies, makes friends, and even finds love. There is talk of a special artifact hiding deep within the caves of Sylar. What could it be? 

Find out in "Immortal Rose".

✦--------------------------------------------------------------------------✦

Features

"Immortal Rose" contains RPG and point and click elements. Along the way, you'll meet many new characters and see many new areas. There is a gallery where you can unlock special art for characters in the game.

✦--------------------------------------------------------------------------✦

PLEASE report any bugs, and feel free to comment suggestions for the future.

Big thanks to Skolaztika for their amazing artwork, this game would never have been possible without it.
